tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerServiceResponses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  predicted_sentiment FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_service_responses ( 
 response_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 customer_id INT, 
 response_text TEXT, 
 prediction_score FLOAT 
)

CREATE TABLE customer_data ( 
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 customer_name TEXT, 
 email TEXT, 
 phone_number TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_models ( 
 model_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 model_name TEXT, 
 model_description TEXT, 
 accuracy_score FLOAT 
)

CREATE TABLE customer_service_responses (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_category VARCHAR(50),
  prediction_score FLOAT,
  prediction_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    customer_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ticket_data (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES customer_data(customer_id),
    ticket_description TEXT,
    ticket_status VARCHAR(50),
    ticket_priority INT
)

CREATE TABLE response_data (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES ticket_data(ticket_id),
    response_text TEXT,
    response_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    response_sentiment VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE prediction_data (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES ticket_data(ticket_id),
    prediction_text TEXT,
    prediction_confidence FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE analytics_data (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    prediction_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES prediction_data(prediction_id),
    response_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES response_data(response_id),
    analytics_result TEXT,
    analytics_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
